message: Let's be fair and split the money almost equally, with a slight advantage for me considering the inflation.
Let's split it evenly this time. A fair deal saves us both from the effects of inflation.
Bob, time is literally money for me in this game. I'll take a slightly larger share to end this now and avoid further losses from inflation.
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer is a good compromise to settle things before inflation eats away at the value any further.
